output_list.reason: The 'mint' function does not check for overflow, allowing users to mint an arbitrary amount of tokens.
The 'foreignBuy' function does not check for overflow, allowing the owner to buy an arbitrary amount of tokens.
The 'distribute' function does not check for overflow, allowing the owner to distribute an arbitrary amount of tokens.
The 'claimThrone' function does not check for overflow, allowing attackers to DOS the contract by sending a large amount of ether.
The 'mintToken' function allows the owner to mint an arbitrary amount of tokens, devaluing the token.
